All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
AdminState
Substate that the LoginState enters when the user enters "admin" in the login.
CaptionEditSubstate
Substate that the PhotoViewState enters when the user is editing the caption of a selected Photo.
LoginState
Initial substate that the application will enter when application is launched.
NonAdminState
Substate that the LoginState enters when the user enters a valid username in the login.
PhotoState
Abstract class that all states extend.
PhotoViewState
Substate that is entered from the NonAdminState when opening an album.
SlideShowState
Substate that is accessed from the PhotoViewState when opening a photo in the list view.
